parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" and promotes her candidacy for president, clearly identifying a parliamentary candidate.  This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, it's designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to vote for Elena Lasconi and the USR party. The call to action "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!" directly aims to influence voting behavior. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks objectivity and is clearly promotional in nature, aiming to sway voters rather than inform them.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented as an advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>853336236997296</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the USR party. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's timing is also crucial; if posted after the official end of the electoral campaign period, it would be a clear violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Elena Lasconi</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID 853336236997296) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Elena Lasconi și Partidul USR pentru alegerile parlamentare, conținând îndemnul explicit „Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidatei și partidului menționat, fapt demonstrat prin prezența numărului CMF 11240015 și prin natura plătită a postării, care vizează o audiență largă.  Postarea, prin conținutul și scopul său, îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, fiind astfel o încălcare clară a legislației electorale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
